name: DynaSlack
description:
Dynamo package providing integration with Slack, allowing you to post messages to Slack via webhooks currently. Includes support for Slack text formatting, emoji/image icons and setting integration name. 
Soon to include support for OAuth flow, posting as a bot or as a user.

Open-source package, please visit repository ( https://github.com/radumg/DynaSlack ) to submit improvement requests, bug reports or to contribute. Alternatively, tweet at me @radugidei .
